title: Weerawansa’s Outburst: Will Govt allow people to take up arms against the UN staff working in Colombo?
content: TC – by Karu Jayasuriya We are astounded by the irresponsible and deplorable call by MP Wimal Weerawansa, a Minister in the present government urging the Sri Lankan public to take up violence and commit acts of aggression against the United Nations offices and their staff in Colombo. Mr. Weerawansa is now a senior cabinet…
